text: The 1994 Tour de Hongrie was the 23rd edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 25 July to 1 August 1994. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Wolfgang Kotzmann. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1994 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" colspan="2" | Type ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;"; rowspan=2" | 25 July | Budapest to Győr | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | Győr to Sopron | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 26 July | Sopron to Nagykanizsa | | alt= | Hilly stage | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text- align:right;" | 27 July | Nagykanizsa to Pécs | | alt= | Hilly stage | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text-align:right;"; | 28 July | Paks to Szolnok | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 6 | style="text-align:right;"; rowspan=2" | 29 July | Szolnok to Békéscsaba | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 7 | Berettyóújfalu to Nyíregyháza | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 8 | style="text-align:right;"; rowspan=2" | 30 July | Nyíregyháza to Tokaj | | link= | Individual time trial | |- ! scope="col" | 9 | Tokaj to Eger | | alt= | Intermediate stage | |- ! scope="col" | 10 | style="text-align:right;"; | 31 July | Miskolc to Budapest | | alt= | Hilly stage | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="4" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Austria | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Miskolci VSC | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 22" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Békéscsaba | style="text- align:right;" | + 1' 57" |} |} ==See also== * 1994 in sports ==References== 1994 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie Category:July 1994 sports events in Europe Category:August 1994 sports events in Europe
